Tarnished is the gilded flora,
Mummering as a monument
Tranquil glories of an era
Polished the sitting bronze
Yet again walled and wronged
under the rising sun and sizzle
Upon solemn granite slates, forlorn
Advance, Advance, Advance
In mirth of heretics and harlotries
Advance, Advance, Advance
Trumpeted her majesty’s requiem
